oneOf.description: This field contains the data usually contained in the request body.

___disabled.description: When set to true, prevents request body from being sent.

___options.description: Additional configurations and options set for various body modes.

___mode.description: Postman stores the type of data associated with this request in this field.

___disabled.description: When set to true, prevents this form data entity from being sent.

___contentType.description: Override Content-Type header of this form data entity.

___disabled.description: When set to true, prevents this form data entity from being sent.

___contentType.description: Override Content-Type header of this form data entity.

oneOf.description: Contains the name of the file to upload. _Not the path_.
A null src indicates that no file has been selected as a part of the request body

anyOf.description: The Standard HTTP method associated with this request.
The Custom HTTP method associated with this request.

description: A request represents an HTTP request. If a string, the string is assumed to be the request URL and the method is assumed to be 'GET'.
title: Request
